(0,): As a database administrator, I want to process deletions for transactions on a specific date, so that I can maintain data cleanliness and compliance As a data analyst, I want to add new PPoPCode cases to derivation logic, so that the system can handle additional scenarios correctly As a UI designer, I want to track issues from Tech Thursday sessions, so that we can prioritize and fix user experience problems As a testing coordinator, I want to schedule user testing sessions with participants, so that we can gather feedback on new features As a DevOps engineer, I want to configure New Relic for applications, so that we can monitor performance and errors effectively
(2,): As a SQL developer, I want to update SQL queries with improved clarity and new cases, so that the database operations are more efficient and maintainable As a deployment manager, I want to deploy FABS to production, so that new features and fixes are available to users
(1,): As a system integrator, I want to sync D1 file generation with FPDS data updates, so that reports are always based on the latest data As a data manager, I want to cache published FABS files for agencies, so that repeated access is faster and reduces database load As a data engineer, I want to load historical FPDS data from specified years, so that we have complete historical records for analysis As a system administrator, I want to update GTAS window dates in the database, so that reporting periods are accurately maintained As a validation specialist, I want to update validation rules, so that data quality checks remain current with business requirements As a file processor, I want to generate D files with caching, so that repeated requests for the same data are served efficiently
(3,): As a data validator, I want to validate ZIP+4 codes, so that address information meets postal service standards As a performance engineer, I want to optimize flexfield performance, so that submissions with many flexfields process faster As a compliance officer, I want to validate files against Schema v1.1, so that data submissions meet regulatory requirements
(4,): As a submission manager, I want to update FABS submission statuses when publishStatus changes, so that users see accurate status information As a support technician, I want to update error message texts, so that users receive clear and accurate error information As a business analyst, I want to derive office names from office codes, so that reports display meaningful information As a dashboard administrator, I want to update status labels on the Submission Dashboard, so that users see accurate and consistent status information
